name: Untame Games

overview:
Untame Games is a digital media start-up company. We design, develop and market cutting edge games and technology. Untame aims to define the future of gaming by bringing innovative, high-quality games to mobile devices, web browsers and gaming consoles around the world. Weâ€™re committed to creating fun, family-safe content that’s instantly accessible. Untame was founded by Itay Keren and Uri Golan.

Among our games are the upcoming Rope Rescue for iPad, iPhone and iPod touch, BblWorld for Facebook and Bubbloobaâ„¢ Online for Facebook and the open web.

UMP, Untame’s proprietary multiplayer server technology, is an intuitive, safe and simple client-server solution for the development of online multiplayer games.
